content.title: 都市計画家によると、公共交通機関のためのアメリカの最善の都市と最悪の都市 -  Vox.com
content.desc: The New York City subway system is plagued by delays because of aging infrastructure. Gary Hershorn/Getty Images Urban planner Christof Spieler tells us what cities are doing right and wrong. US public transportation is notoriously underdeveloped compared to most other wealthy countries. In fact, according to a recent study, the New York City subway is the only US rail system that ranks among the 10 busiest in the world. Another report found that transit ridership fell in 31 of 35 major metropolitan areas last year, including in Washington, DC, Chicago, and New York City. However, 2018 has ...
